name: BEAUFORT COUNTY, NC
description: Beaufort County is one of the 100 counties within the State of North Carolina.
sampleDescriptions: Pending issuance and delays in issuance of revised flood plain maps for Beaufort County, NC.  The implementation of new maps will affect tax values of property in Beaufort County, NC.
Issuance and delays in issuance of pending revised flood plain maps in Beaufort, NC.
Pending issuance and delays in issuance of revised flood plain maps for Beaufort County, NC.  The implementation of new maps will affect tax values of property in Beaufort County, NC.
Issuance and delays in issuance of pending revised flood plain maps in Beaufort, NC.
FEMA maps are produced by US Dept. of Homeland Security FEMA, Risk MAP Region IV. The delay in the issuance of FEMA maps have been financially harmful to Beaufort County citizens.
